about_the_game:
Office 29 is a first-person anomaly horror game set in an eerie office building. After falling asleep at your desk, you awaken at night to find the entire building empty. Strange occurrences begin to unfold, and you must collect 29 personal belongings scattered throughout the office while avoiding mysterious anomalies.

Features:

  • Surreal Anomalies: Encounter strange and unsettling events, from floating figures to objects behaving unnaturally.

  • Puzzle Exploration: Solve environmental puzzles as you navigate the empty office and uncover its secrets.

  • Atmospheric Horror: Immerse yourself in a tense and unsettling atmosphere as you try to escape the building.

  • Story-Driven Collectibles: Discover the story of Office 29 through the 29 collectible items scattered across the building.

Will you make it out, or will the office claim you as its next anomaly?

Play Time

20-60 minutes

Controls

  • Use W-A-S-D to move around

  • Mouse to look around

  • Mouse click to interact with certain objects

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes involving death and themes related to mental health, which may be disturbing for some players. Viewer discretion is advised.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.15
  • Processor: Apple M3 chip with 8‑core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 12.0
  • Processor: 2 GHz Quad-Core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

name: Office 29

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel Core i7 4770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: You overslept at work, and when you woke up, everyone was already gone. The office is eerily empty, and strange anomalies seem to have taken over. Explore the office, gather your 29 items, and go home.
